TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputBindingCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class InputBindingCollection Implements IList
public ref class InputBindingCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList

summary.span: 개체의 정렬된 컬렉션을 나타냅니다.

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 파생 되는 모든 개체 가 라는 합니다.All objects that derive from have an named . 파생 되는 모든 개체 가 라는 합니다.All objects that derive from have an named . 그러나 이러한 컬렉션 설정 된 경우 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], 컬렉션의 항목의 파생된 클래스 여야 합니다. 그런 다음 것이 아니라 직접 개체입니다.However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of rather than direct objects. 즉, 기본 public 생성자를 지원 하지 않습니다.This is because does not support a default public constructor. 따라서 항목에는 에 설정 된 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 일반적으로 파생 클래스는 기본 public 생성자와 같은 지 원하는 또는 합니다.Therefore, the items in a that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as or . ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 한 에 연결 된 합니다.The following example creates a and associates it with a . 에 추가 되 고 에 합니다.The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]
